column2: what I consider the best part of the meal
column3: and perhaps one of the best things I ate on my trip to Chicago was the Crumpets with Chorizo Maple Syrup. The maple syrup was infused with the spice and the salt of the chorizo
column4: which elevated something as amazing as maple syrup into something even grander. Having that poured on top of nice fluffy crumpets
column5: and some gooseberries on the side for tartness to balance the sweet maple syrup was out of this world good. It really was the perfect dish. Highly recommended!
